function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate management of health risks, injuries, diseases, disabilities, psychological problems, and deaths in pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate covid-19 information in literature","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of grey literature in the study","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Language limitation to english","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of covid-19 related materials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poverty leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak rural infrastructure exacerbating disease spread","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus among field workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of training in covid-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference for living in gated communities during pandemics may lead to increased concentration of individuals in a confined space, raising the risk of disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouragement of others to move to gated communities may lead to societal segregation and inequitable access to resources and amenities during pandemics.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the gated community environment for safety during pandemics may lead to complacency in implementing broader public health measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in built environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of surfacewise 2 in liquid form using astm e1052 standard test method.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in workplace settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness on ipc measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of sars-cov and mers-cov studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in extracted data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of publication bias leading to inaccurate assessment of intervention effectiveness","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in study design and settings may affect generalizability of results and recommendations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of participants in some studies may result in skewed or unreliable findings.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies conducted before covid-19 vaccinations were available may limit the applicability of findings to the current environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete reporting of intervention follow-up time in longitudinal studies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment on the effectiveness of environmental adjustments in workplace covid-19 ipc measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systematic testing and monitoring","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of ppe and hygiene practices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of contact tracing and quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in ppe use and efficacy testing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
